title: Need help with ID. Looks like Carlton, but isn't.
author: mlanton

comments.content:
Ehmcke HTF, by Hoefler Type Foundry circa 1991, but not offered on Hoefler & Co. website.

Don’t know where you could by a legitimate version....

AFAIK this was originally a font made by Hoefler for the Mac and its appearance in the PC world was the result of people using Transtype rather than a publication by Hoefler.  
As for legitimate use on a PC this would seem to depend on obtaining permission from Hoefler .  
Don

The font was designed by F. H. Ehmcke for the Flinsch foundry in 1908. Bauer sold it as Ehmcke. Stephenson Blake also sold it, or a very similar version, as Carlton.  
FWIIW I prefer the digital version produced by Hoefler.  
Don
